TopicTitle: How can i create new planets?

Articles.Content:
Hi, i wonder if there is any tutorial regarding the creation of new planets/moons. 

I would like to be able to create anew, if it is not very hard.

Can you give me advices of what programs do i need and/or how to edit ksp in order to do that?

Thanks
You can bug the authors of kerbol plus or new horizons.(google it) They use a mod which is Korporious which is similar to PF CE but much better and less buggier.
